Body:
app = Flask(__name__)
app.config.update(CASBIN_MODEL_CONF='./tests/model.conf')
app.static_url_path = '/static'
app.secret_key = 'this is a temp key'
cm = CasbinManager()
cm.init_app(app)
@cm.policy_loader
def load():
    with open('./tests/policy.csv', 'rb') as fd:
        return IOAdapter(io.BytesIO(fd.read()))
with app.test_client() as c:
    c.get('/static')
    self.assertIsNotNone(current_enforcer)
    assert current_enforcer.enforce('user:alice', 'data:1', 'read') is True
